Don't miss Julia Stewart Lowndes and I talk about Quarto at rstudio::conf(2022) at 9am ET.
Join us in Potomac A or on the live stream at [rstd.io/conf](https://rstd.io/conf).

Our talks is titled **Hello Quarto: Share + Collaborate + Teach + Reimagine**.
And our slides are at [mine.quarto.pub/hello-quarto](https://mine.quarto.pub/hello-quarto) if you'd like to follow along!
